程序包 com.sismics.rest.util

类 ValidationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sismics.rest.util.ValidationUtil
  • public class ValidationUtil
extends Object
    Utility class to validate parameters.
    作者:
    jtremeaux

    • 方法详细资料

      • validateRequired

        public static void validateRequired​(Object s,
                                    String name)
                             throws ClientException
        Checks that the argument is not null.
        参数:
        s - Object tu validate
        name - Name of the parameter
        抛出:
        ClientException

      • validateLength

        public static String validateLength​(String s,
                                    String name,
                                    Integer lengthMin,
                                    Integer lengthMax,
                                    boolean nullable)
                             throws ClientException
        Validate a string length.
        参数:
        s - String to validate
        name - Name of the parameter
        lengthMin - Minimum length (or null)
        lengthMax - Maximum length (or null)
        nullable - True if the string can be empty or null
        返回:
        String without white spaces
        抛出:
        ClientException

      • validateLength

        public static String validateLength​(String s,
                                    String name,
                                    Integer lengthMin,
                                    Integer lengthMax)
                             throws ClientException
        Validate a string length. The string mustn't be empty.
        参数:
        s - String to validate
        name - Name of the parameter
        lengthMin - Minimum length (or null)
        lengthMax - Maximum length (or null)
        返回:
        String without white spaces
        抛出:
        ClientException

        参数:
        s - String to validate
        name - Name of the parameter
        返回:
        String without white spaces

        ClientException
